mapper.sql: generalize_id, address_id, generalize_money, generalize_commission, generalize_start_time, generalize_end_time, brand_id
mapper.select: select generalize_id,g.generalize_address address_type,generalize_money,generalize_commission,generalize_start_time,generalize_end_time,brand_id,s.address_id from system_generalize s inner join generalize_address g on s.address_id=g.address_id where generalize_id = #{generalizeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into system_generalize (address_id, generalize_money, generalize_commission, generalize_start_time, generalize_end_time, brand_id) values (jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{generalizeMoney,jdbcType=REAL}, #{generalizeCommission,jdbcType=REAL}, #{generalizeStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{generalizeEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

generalize_id,

generalize_start_time,
generalize_end_time,
brand_id,

generalize_money = #{generalizeMoney,jdbcType=REAL},
generalize_commission = #{generalizeCommission,jdbcType=REAL},

brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where generalize_id = #{generalizeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
